title: can't "set max upload size"  -  oc 5.0.6
body:
### actual behaviour
you can set value whatever you want, directly after editing (and saving) it shows you the size you put in. if you change from "administrator page" to another page and later come back to the administrator panel it is set back to 8 mb (and of course the webif allows only to upload 8mb)

the value you've entered is written correctly to the .htaccess file, for example:

php_value upload_max_filesize 2g
php_value post_max_size 2g

if you manually edit the actual php.ini file (in plesk that is /var/www/vhosts/yourdomain/etc) and reload the administrator page that value is set as wished. you have to set "upload_max_filesize". but again you can't change it from administrator page.

obviously plesk/apache/oc combination does not recognise the settings inside .htaccess, even it is read and writeable.

plesk has the feature, that you can override default domain settings. you have to create a file called vhost.conf inside /var/www/vhosts/yourdomain/conf.

i've added such an file with this content

<directory /var/www/vhosts/ yourdomain/httpdocs>
    allowoverride all
</directory>

<ifmodule mod_fcgid.c>
    fcgidmaxrequestlen 1073741824
.......
.......
</ifmodule>

the fcgidmaxrequestlen setting does work (so vhost.conf seems to be valid and working), if you don't set it uploads bigger than 16mb are not possible (one more trap inside plesk based installations - but that is another story....)

but the settings in general don't help with the problem on the admin panel.


### steps to reproduce
fresh installation of ubuntu on strato vserver. after install apt-get update, apt-upgrade. added one domain with plesk.

installed via webinstaller.

### server configuration
operating system: ubuntu (uname -a: linux hxxxxxxx.stratoserver.net 2.6.32-042stab055.12 #1 smp wed may 23 16:07:36 msd 2012 i686 athlon i386 gnu/linux)

web server: apache 2.2.22-1ubuntu1
database: mysql 5.5.22-0ubuntu1
php version: 5.3.10-1ubuntu3
owncloud version: 5.0.6 

### client configuration
browser: any
